Goal Representation:
['1. Process the chicken and cook it.', "2. Boil the pasta until it's cooked.", '3. Combine the chic
ken and pasta with desired seasoning or sauce.', '4. Transfer the chicken pasta to a plate.']

behavior process_and_cook_chicken(chicken: item, cutting_board: item, knife: item, pot: item, stove:
 item):
    body:
        achieve_face_to_chicken(chicken)
        observe_chicken(chicken)
        achieve_face_to_cutting_board(cutting_board)
        
        move_to_cutting_board(chicken, cutting_board)
        place_chicken_on_board(chicken, cutting_board)
        achieve_once inhand(knife)
        slice_chicken(chicken, cutting_board, knife)
        
        bind faucet: item where:
            is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, cutting_board)
        fill_pot_with_water(pot)
        
        achieve is_off(faucet)
        grab_the_pot(pot)
        place_chicken_in_pot(chicken, pot)
        put_pot_on_stove(pot, stove)
        turn_on_stove(stove)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind chicken: item where:
            is_food_chicken(chicken)
        bind cutting_board: item where:
            is_cutting_board(cutting_board)
        bind knife: item where:
            is_knife(knife)
        bind pot: item where:
            is_pot(pot)
        bind stove: item where:
            is_stove(stove)
        process_and_cook_chicken(chicken, cutting_board, knife, pot, stove)
